lines.text: In light of David Greenberg's recently announced appointment as Senior Vice
President, Corporate Affairs, Philip Morris Interational Inc., Murray H. Bring, Vice
Chairman, External Affairs and General Counsel, Philip Morris Companies Inc., and
Steven C. Parrish, Senior Vice President, Corporate Affairs, Philip Morris Companies
Inc., are pleased to announce the following organizational appointments. These
James Spector is appointed Vice President, Corporate Affairs Strategy and
Development, Philip Morris Management Corp. reporting to Steve Parrish. Jim will
assume responsibility for strategy and development for Corporate Affairs worldwide
in addition to leadership of our PM21 Initiative.
•George Knox, Vice President Corporate Affairs Strategy, Philip Morris
Management Corp. George will continue to be responsible for the professional
development strategy for Corporate Affairs and work closely with the Global
Clare Purcell, Manager, Corporate Affairs Strategy, Philip Morris Management
Joan Cryan, Manager, Corporate Affairs Policy, Philip Morris Management Corp.
• Janine Rosen, Manager, Corporate Affairs, Philip Morris Management Corp.
Please join us in wishing Jim and George success in their new assignments.

full_text:
FORM r3214 (Front) • REV, 5/95
DATE:
October 21, 1999
ORGANIZATION
ANNOUNCEMENT
ENTITY:
Philip Morris
PHILIP MORRIS
Management Corp.
NUMBER:
PMMC-051-99
TO:
ALL DEPARTMENT HEADS
FROM:
Anne L. Skillin
In light of David Greenberg's recently announced appointment as Senior Vice
President, Corporate Affairs, Philip Morris Interational Inc., Murray H. Bring, Vice
Chairman, External Affairs and General Counsel, Philip Morris Companies Inc., and
Steven C. Parrish, Senior Vice President, Corporate Affairs, Philip Morris Companies
Inc., are pleased to announce the following organizational appointments. These
appointments are effective immediately.
James Spector is appointed Vice President, Corporate Affairs Strategy and
Development, Philip Morris Management Corp. reporting to Steve Parrish. Jim will
assume responsibility for strategy and development for Corporate Affairs worldwide
in addition to leadership of our PM21 Initiative.
Reporting to Jim will be:
•George Knox, Vice President Corporate Affairs Strategy, Philip Morris
Management Corp. George will continue to be responsible for the professional
development strategy for Corporate Affairs and work closely with the Global
Corporate Affairs Council.
Clare Purcell, Manager, Corporate Affairs Strategy, Philip Morris Management
Corp.
Joan Cryan, Manager, Corporate Affairs Policy, Philip Morris Management Corp.
• Janine Rosen, Manager, Corporate Affairs, Philip Morris Management Corp.
Please join us in wishing Jim and George success in their new assignments.
2072366545
Anse Akellin
